TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content: based on a recent south park episode I believe
I'm finally letting a tiny bit of hype creep in. Haven't felt any hype till now so I'll have an ample supply for the release.

Just to make everyone jealous...

I've been playing experimentals for a few weeks now.

Either hype towards the update, or hate towards me has increased

or hate towards me has increased

Nah, there's no hate here. Just rocket propelled hugs

HAVING SAID THAT....

Hate leads to anger, and a whole bunch of other things, but eventually hate leads to moon sized space stations armed with planet destroying lasers.... which would be cool.

So perhaps a little hate in the Kerbaverse wouldn't be such a bad thing?

Just to make everyone jealous...

I've been playing experimentals for a few weeks now.

Either hype towards the update, or hate towards me has increased

So jealous! I applied for tester but I'm awful at writing bug reports so didn't get it. (fair enough)

So jealous! I applied for tester but I'm awful at writing bug reports so didn't get it. (fair enough)

I believe there were around 750 applicants for ~50 spots

I believe there were around 750 applicants for ~50 spots

are you surprised?

im not, i didn't bother applying, for that reason
Yeah I didn't apply because I knew you needed people who would be able to reproduce Danny2462's latest video to find out what happened.

Rowsdower just left IRC Chat.

I think release is imminent.

To check

go to

webchat.freenode.net channel is #steamdb-announce

*throws her luggage onto the Hype Train*

*watches the luggage block the smokestack*

*averts her eyes from the imminent explosion*

"Still wish I were on that train right now...."
I can't wait until I can build my Skattershot missile: IBBM Edition
There is no movement on steamdb page for three days,is there something I dont know?

*averts her eyes from the imminent explosion*

Explosions just provide moar hype, and therefore moar speed!
I think maybe tomorrow

So jealous! I applied for tester but I'm awful at writing bug reports so didn't get it. (fair enough)

Knowing myself, I would probably screw around with it a lot, maybe find a bug, have no idea how to reproduce it, and then continue screwing around. As much as I would love being a tester, I know others are probably much more qualified.
I won't launch the HypeSuperluminal Drive until the cryptic Twitter messages start appearing.
Have they blocked SteamDB from updating? It hasn't been updated since friday

I won't launch the HypeSuperluminal Drive until the cryptic Twitter messages start appearing.

Engage it, cryptic messages already there

https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP/status/519186388890030080

Engage it, cryptic messages already there

https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP/status/519186388890030080

OK, we'll have it on ten-minute alert. Be warned, if it is activated and the prediction turns out to be wrong, it will overload and destroy everything for five miles, including the HypePlane.

Be warned, if it is activated and the prediction turns out to be wrong, it will overload and destroy everything for five miles, including the HypePlane.

Mere collateral damage.

I find myself weirdly excited about this one, despite playing with SP+ for the last couple of months.

Partly it's because I don't want to start any new missions with a release imminent. Partly because, much as I'm loving SP+, I'm seeing it's limitations - limitations apparently fixed in the release such as symmetry and easier (ALT to eliminate surface mounting) cargo bay building.

Kinda hoping it's tonight as I'm busy tomorrow

NOOO

I'M POSTING FROM SEAT 4 OF HYPE PLANE

IF IT EXPLODES

I DIE!!!

BTW, getting lonely on IRC Chat.

Rowsdower just left IRC Chat.

I think release is imminent.

To check

go to

webchat.freenode.net channel is #steamdb-announce

I wouldn't look *that* deeply into it. I had to reset my computer lol.
It says that the reason was "leaving" but now your back answering my IRC questions.
I wouldn't look *that* deeply into it. I had to reset my computer lol.
